definition: testimony by word or deed to your religious faith, to see an event happen, to be present during something
details:
noun
- testimony by word or deed to your religious faith
- a close observer
= synonyms: spectator
- someone who sees an event and reports what happened
= synonyms: informant, witnesser
- (law) a person who attests to the genuineness of a document or signature by adding their own signature
= synonyms: attestant, attestor, attestator
- (law) a person who testifies under oath in a court of law
verb
- to see an event happen, to be present during something
= example: to see an event happen, to be present during something
- perceive or be contemporaneous with
= synonyms: find
